forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 50. West southwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
This afternoon in Downtown San Francisco unfolds under a clear sky, inviting the sun to paint the day in gentle warmth. The current temperature hovers around 64 degrees, gradually settling into a soft, 61 as the hours pass. With a breezy west wind at about 10 miles per hour, the air carries a refreshing crispness, perfect for those who wish to wander about the city’s streets or find solace in one of its many cafés. 

As twilight approaches, the forecast promises mostly clear conditions and a comfortable low of 50. The noticeable absence of fog allows for sweeping views of the skyline and the surrounding hills, a rarity that beckons locals and visitors alike. Dress in layers to enjoy both the warmth of the sun and the cooler evening air, perhaps donning a light jacket for when the sun dips behind the horizon. It is a perfect day to stroll along the Embarcadero, savoring the unique charm of the waterfront, or to explore the ever-bustling Mission District, indulging in the culinary delights that define this vibrant city. The tranquility of the afternoon melds beautifully into the serenity of the evening, creating an optimal setting for a peaceful retreat or an adventurous culinary exploration.
